productSchema.description: Usage message for a Next Generation (Nova) server.
productSchema.attribute: The flavor id of the server.
The flavor name of the server.

attribute.name: status
attribute.allowedValues: ACTIVE BUILD DELETED ERROR HARD_REBOOT MIGRATING PASSWORD REBOOT REBUILD RESCUE RESIZE REVERT_RESIZE SUSPENDED UNKNOWN VERIFY_RESIZE SHELVED

productSchema.attribute: Does the server use a RedHat license.
Does the server use an MSSQL license.
Does the server use an MSSQL Web license.
Does the server use a Windows license.
Does the server use an SELinux license.
The amount of bandwidth in, in kilobytes.
The amount of bandwidth out, in kilobytes.

xpathAssertion.test: if (xsd:boolean(@isRedHat)) then not(xsd:boolean(@isSELinux) or xsd:boolean(@isWindows) or xsd:boolean(@isMSSQL) or xsd:boolean(@isMSSQLWeb)) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If server isRedHat then it cannot be SELinux, Windows, MSSQL or MSSQLQWeb.

xpathAssertion.test: if (xsd:boolean(@isSELinux)) then not(xsd:boolean(@isRedHat) or xsd:boolean(@isWindows) or xsd:boolean(@isMSSQL) or xsd:boolean(@isMSSQLWeb)) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If server isSELinux then it cannot be RedHat, Windows, MSSQL or MSSQLQWeb.

xpathAssertion.test: if (xsd:boolean(@isWindows)) then not(xsd:boolean(@isRedHat) or xsd:boolean(@isSELinux)) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If server isWindows then it cannot be RedHat or SELinux.

xpathAssertion.test: if (xsd:boolean(@isMSSQL)) then xsd:boolean(@isWindows) and not(xsd:boolean(@isMSSQLWeb) or xsd:boolean(@isRedHat) or xsd:boolean(@isSELinux)) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If server isMSSQL then it has to be windows, and not RedHat, SELinux or MSSQLWeb.

xpathAssertion.test: if (xsd:boolean(@isMSSQLWeb)) then xsd:boolean(@isWindows) and not(xsd:boolean(@isMSSQL) or xsd:boolean(@isRedHat) or xsd:boolean(@isSELinux)) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If server isMSSQLWeb then it has to be windows, and not RedHat, SELinux or MSSQL.
